text: Hey there!
Hi, how are you?
I'm doing pretty well, and yourself?
not bad at all, thanks
Have you ever heard of the charity Save the Children?
I have  heard of it, they do good work
I was hoping I could help answer any questions you may have today about them, and then we could talk about donating to their cause.
Sounds good.  Are they just third world countries or do they go all over?
Currently they are in 120 countries, so I think they span beyond just third world countries at this point.
wow, that is awesome.  Good to see good going in in this crazy world

Yeah, I agree. Something that was very important to me was making sure that whatever I donated to them was actually used for good - and it is in their case. They have an A rating when it comes to charity ratings.
Oh good to know, I wondered how much actually went to them.

Yeah, sometimes you heard about so much going into the admin side or paying the salaries for some of the people, but that's not the case here. Are there any particular issues you are passionate about when it comes to helping people?
Helping them become self sufficient, not needing so much help.  So I guess training and teaching them

Yes, that's a great cause. Save the Children assists in setting up schools/hospitals and providing the training for these less fortunate communities which does allow for them to move forward on their own
wow, I didnt know that, that is great news
So may I ask how much you'd consider donating today? Or are there any other questions I could answer for you?
Id be willing to give $1 towards it today
Great! It's generosity from all of us that can make a difference, I firmly believe that.
I also believe you cannot out give God, when you bless, it is returned.
